question: When will my order be delivered?
answer: Your order is usually delivered within 3-5 business days. You can check the exact delivery date on the order tracking page.

question: How do I check my order status?
answer: To check order status, go to the 'My Orders' section and select the specific order. You will find the latest tracking update there.

question: What are the delivery charges?
answer: Delivery charges depend on the city and order value. Exact delivery charges are shown on the checkout page.

question: Is cash on delivery available?
answer: Yes, cash on delivery (COD) is available in many locations. If your address does not support COD, the option will be hidden at checkout.

question: What is the return policy?
answer: Our standard return policy is 7–14 days after receiving the product. We accept returns if the product is unused and in original packaging.

question: When will I get my refund?
answer: After return or cancellation, refunds are usually processed within 3–7 business days. Delays may occur due to banks or payment providers.

question: Where will the refund be credited?
answer: If you paid via card/UPI, the refund will be credited there. For cash on delivery orders, refunds are given to your bank account or wallet.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click on the 'Forgot Password' button on the login page, then enter your registered email or phone number. You will receive a reset link or OTP.

question: My account is locked, what should I do?
answer: Accounts may be locked for security reasons. Try resetting your password and logging in again. If the issue persists, contact the support team.

question: How do I change my address?
answer: For future orders, you can add or edit addresses in the 'My Account' > 'Addresses' section. Addresses for already placed orders can only be changed for a limited time.

question: How do I cancel my order?
answer: If the order hasn't been dispatched, you can use the Cancel button in 'My Orders'. Cancellation is not allowed after dispatch, but you can return it.

question: How do I download the invoice?
answer: Select the relevant order in 'My Orders'. The 'Download Invoice' or 'View Invoice' option is available there.

question: How do I find warranty details?
answer: Warranty details are mentioned in the 'Specifications' or 'Warranty' section on the product page. For branded electronics, you can also verify on the brand website.

question: Is the product original?
answer: We only list products from genuine and verified sellers. All branded products are 100% original and come with a manufacturer warranty.

question: What if I have a size issue?
answer: If the size doesn't fit, you can raise a return or exchange request, if the exchange option is available for the product.

question: How do I reschedule delivery?
answer: If the courier partner supports rescheduling, you will get an option via SMS/WhatsApp/link. Otherwise, contact the support team.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact us via chat support, email, or phone. Details are available on the 'Contact Us' page.

question: Is gift wrapping available?
answer: Gift wrapping option is shown at checkout for selected products. If available, you can select it for a nominal extra charge.

question: Promo code is not applying, what to do?
answer: Check the promo code terms and conditions—minimum order value, expiry date, or specific category restrictions. If the issue persists, contact support with a screenshot.

question: Delivery is very late, what to do?
answer: Sometimes delays occur due to weather, festival season, or courier issues. Check the tracking page; if delayed by more than 48 hours, message support.

question: Payment failed but amount deducted, what will happen?
answer: In such cases, the amount is usually automatically reversed within 3–5 business days. If not, contact your bank/payment provider with the reference ID.

question: Is international delivery available?
answer: Currently, we provide international delivery in selected countries only. If your country is shown at checkout, delivery is possible.

question: App is not updating, what to do?
answer: Manually update the app from the Play Store or App Store. If the issue persists, uninstall and reinstall the app.

question: Will I get refunds for multiple items separately or together?
answer: If multiple items were in the same order, the refund is generally processed in a single transaction, but separate entries may appear in the bank statement.

question: My coupon code was used once, can I use it again?
answer: Most coupon codes are for one-time use. You can only use it again if multi-use is allowed in the terms.

question: Facing technical issue on website, what to do?
answer: Clear browser cache and try in incognito mode or use another browser/device. If the issue continues, report to support with a screenshot.

question: What is the delivery time?
answer: Our standard delivery timing is from 9 AM to 9 PM. It may vary slightly depending on the location.

question: Can I change the address after placing the order?
answer: If the order hasn't been shipped yet, you can change the address. The change option is shown in the My Orders section.

question: Can I cancel if the order is shipped?
answer: Cancellation is not possible if the order has been shipped, but you can refuse delivery and process a return.

question: What if I receive a damaged product?
answer: If you received a damaged product, raise a return request within 48 hours by sharing pictures of the product.

question: I received the wrong item, what should I do?
answer: In case of a wrong item, you can choose either a replacement or a refund.

question: How is return pickup done?
answer: Return pickup is done through our courier partner and is usually scheduled within 2–3 working days.

question: Why can a return be rejected?
answer: A return is rejected if the product is in used condition or original packaging is missing.

question: What is the replacement process?
answer: After the replacement request is approved, the courier partner picks up the old item and the new item is dispatched.

question: How long does replacement take?
answer: Replacement is generally completed within 5–7 days.

question: In which mode will I get the refund?
answer: The refund will be given in the same mode as the payment method used for placing the order.

question: Why is a refund rejected?
answer: A refund is rejected if the product does not follow return rules—for example: missing accessories, tampering, damage, etc.

question: When does wallet refund come?
answer: Wallet refunds usually come instantly within 1–2 hours.

question: How many days does bank refund take?
answer: Bank refunds take 3–7 business days.

question: How do I raise a return request?
answer: Go to My Orders > Select Order > Choose Return Option and select the reason.

question: What is the return eligibility criteria?
answer: The product must be unused, with original tags, and within the 7–14 days return window.

question: Can a product bought on offer be returned?
answer: Yes, offer products can be returned unless 'no-return' is mentioned on the product page.

question: Can digital products be returned?
answer: Digital products like codes/software are generally non-returnable.

question: When do I get cashback?
answer: Cashback is credited to the wallet 24–72 hours after the order is delivered.

question: How to apply a coupon code?
answer: Enter the code in the 'Apply Coupon' box on the checkout page.

question: Why is the coupon showing invalid?
answer: The coupon might be expired, minimum order value not met, or not applicable to the product category.

question: I didn't receive order confirmation email, what to do?
answer: Check your spam folder; if not found there, verify your email address.

question: Delivery partner is not contacting, what to do?
answer: The courier's contact number is given on the tracking page; you can call them directly.

question: What happens if the order is misplaced?
answer: In case of a misplaced order, a full refund or replacement is provided.

question: How do I place a bulk order?
answer: For bulk orders, contact support; we provide special pricing.

question: What are international delivery charges?
answer: International delivery charges vary according to the destination country.

question: How do I get a GST invoice?
answer: You can download the GST invoice from the My Orders section.

question: How do I add delivery instructions?
answer: The 'Add Delivery Instructions' option is available on the checkout page.

question: What is the charge for gift packing?
answer: Gift packing charges are in the range of ₹20–₹50, depending on the product.

question: How to apply for EMI?
answer: Select EMI from the bank list at checkout and choose the tenure.

question: Is no cost EMI available?
answer: No-cost EMI is available on selected products, mentioned on the product page.

question: I didn't get a tracking ID, what to do?
answer: Tracking ID is generated 24 hours after shipment. If not received, contact support.

question: Can a prepaid order be converted to cash on delivery?
answer: No, a prepaid order cannot be converted to COD.

question: Can the return pickup address be different?
answer: Yes, the pickup address can be different if it is in a serviceable area.

question: Why is the order on-hold?
answer: An order goes on-hold when address or payment verification is pending.

question: Facing payment error on website, what to do?
answer: Clear browser cache or try from another browser/device.

question: App is crashing, what to do?
answer: Uninstall the app and install it fresh.

question: Why is the order delayed?
answer: Orders may be delayed due to weather issues, festival rush, or courier delays.

question: How do I claim product warranty?
answer: Warranty claims are processed directly by the manufacturer; an invoice is required.

question: Is extended warranty available?
answer: Extended warranty add-ons are available for selected electronics.

question: How is a defective product identified?
answer: It is recommended to make an unboxing video when receiving the product.

question: Are COD charges extra?
answer: Some locations have a nominal COD fee which shows at checkout.

question: Delivery partner was rude, how to complain?
answer: Use the 'Report Issue' option in My Orders.

question: Multiple items in one order, how to return?
answer: You can return individual items separately.

question: Is store pickup option available?
answer: Yes, store pickup is supported at selected stores.

question: I want to send an order as a gift, can the invoice be hidden?
answer: Yes, there is an option to hide price/invoice in gift orders.

question: How do I earn reward points?
answer: Reward points are earned through shopping, reviews, and referrals.

question: How are reward points redeemed?
answer: Reward points can be redeemed on the checkout page.

question: Payment showing pending, what is the problem?
answer: Sometimes bank confirmation is delayed. Wait for 30 minutes.

question: What does dispatched mean?
answer: Dispatched means the product has been handed over to the courier partner.

question: What does out for delivery mean?
answer: The rider has left for your location.

question: Shows delivered but product not received, what to do?
answer: A courier investigation is raised which takes 48 hours.

question: Missed return pickup, what to do?
answer: Pickup is rescheduled in the next available slot.

question: Can I change KYC details?
answer: Yes, there is an option to update KYC in account settings.

question: Can I withdraw wallet balance?
answer: Wallet balance cannot be withdrawn to a bank; it is used only for shopping.

question: How do I post an order review?
answer: There is a 'Write a Review' button on the product page.

question: How to enable app notifications?
answer: Turn on notifications in Phone settings > App settings.

question: Order tracking page not opening, what to do?
answer: Check internet connection or reload the browser.

question: What does order stuck in transit mean?
answer: This is a delay on the courier side; product movement is taking time.

question: Why did the pickup agent reject the item?
answer: Pickup is rejected if the item is not in proper packaging or is tampered with.

question: When is delivery free?
answer: Free delivery is available upon completing the minimum order value.

question: Received a different color product, what to do?
answer: In case of a wrong color issue, you can choose replacement or refund.

question: How are gift card codes redeemed?
answer: Redeem option is in the wallet section.

question: What is the customer support email?
answer: Support email is given on our Contact Us page.

question: Missed delivery attempt, what to do?
answer: The rider will attempt again on the next working day.

question: Getting order verify call, is it genuine?
answer: Verification calls are genuine but never share OTP.

question: How do I deactivate my account?
answer: Contact the support team to raise a deactivation request.

question: Why are some products non-returnable?
answer: Some items are non-returnable due to hygiene and safety reasons.

question: Why is shipping weight extra?
answer: Additional weight charges apply for oversized or heavy items.

question: How does buy one get one offer work?
answer: BOGO items apply automatically as soon as both products are added to the cart.

question: Do I get a call to confirm COD order?
answer: Yes, sometimes COD verification calls come for fraud prevention.

question: What is the order packing time?
answer: Packing is usually completed within 12–24 hours.

question: How many characters can a gift message be?
answer: Gift message is allowed up to a maximum of 200 characters.

question: Order shows delivered but agent didn't call
answer: In such cases, delivery proof is checked for verification.

question: How is product quality assured?
answer: Products are from verified sellers and go through quality checks.

question: Review looks fake, what to do?
answer: Fake reviews can be reported using the report review button.

question: Is there a restocking fee?
answer: Restocking fee is applicable in some categories depending on product condition.
